name: 沈耀明
objective: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
schedule:
Weeks	Date	Subjects
1	9/16	Ch1. Introduction	
2	9/23	Ch1a. Introduction	
3	9/30	Ch2. Data Representation in Computer Systems	
4	10/7	Ch2a. Focus on Codes for Data Recording and Transmission	
5	10/14	Ch3. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
6	10/21	Ch3a. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic	
7	10/28	Ch4. An Introduction to a Simple Computer	
8	11/4	Ch4a An Introduction to a Simple Computer	
9	11/11	Ch5. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures	
10	11/18	Midterm Test期中考
11	11/25	Ch5a. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures	
12	12/2	Ch6. Memory	
13	12/9	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems	
14	12/16	Ch7a. Focus on Data Compression	
15	12/23	Ch8. System Software
16	12/30	Ch9. Alternative Architectures	
17	1/6	Ch10. Topics in Embedded Systems	
18	1/13	Final Test 期末考
scorePolicy:
1.	期中考佔30%
2.	期末考佔35%
3.	作業佔20%, 每次佔5%, 遲交一天扣0.5%.
4.	出席狀況佔10%, 每缺席一次扣1%, 遲到早退扣0.5%.
5.	課堂表現佔5%.
materials:
書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 2/e

作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
代理商: 東華書局
